content: cozy cocoon cowl designed by melissa clulow cozy cocoon cowl melissa clulow finished measurements 49 circumference 9 tall yarn 3 skeins of rowan cocoon 80% wool 20% mohair 115 m / 126 y / 100 g or approximately 345 m of bulky weight yarn needles 7 mm 32 circular knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 14 sts per 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch exact gauge is not critical pattern cast on 152 sts place marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist row 1 5 knit row 6 8 purl repeat row 1 - 8 seven times knit 5 more row bind off loosely weave in ends and block lightly www espacetricot com cozy cocoon cowl 2
